abstract: The environment associated with the graphics context.
overview:
## Discussion

SwiftUI initially sets this to the environment of the context’s enclosing view. The context uses values like display resolution and the color scheme from the environment to resolve types like [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Image] and [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Color]. You can also access values stored in the environment for your own purposes.

# environment

**Instance Property**

The environment associated with the graphics context.

## Declaration

```swift
var environment: EnvironmentValues { get }
```

## Discussion

SwiftUI initially sets this to the environment of the context’s enclosing view. The context uses values like display resolution and the color scheme from the environment to resolve types like [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Image] and [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Color]. You can also access values stored in the environment for your own purposes.
title: environment
